thread.title: Best hospitality got in paris
thread.title_full: Best hospitality got in paris - Review of B Montmartre Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Empi J
title: Best hospitality got in paris
text:
Not my first time visiting paris, with all problem to speak france and hard accent to undertand while they spoken in english! But not in this hotel, i forgot to ask her name... she's the one at the front desk as reception... from the first time we check in till checked out, she explaining, recomend things and show us the best way to do.. thank you so much
In another way this hotel is easy to found, close with metro station and sorrounding with plenty of caffe and restaurant...
